survey.theme: The Theory of Planned Behavior Survey
survey.purpose: To assess consumer intentions and attitudes towards purchasing organic food

questions.question_text: I intend to purchase organic food in the next month.
Buying organic food is beneficial to my health.
I feel confident in my ability to purchase organic food if I want to.
People who are important to me think I should purchase organic food.
The decision to buy organic food is entirely up to me.

question_comments.comment: Clear intention measurement, relevant to the survey's theme.
Captures self-efficacy related to buying behaviors.
Addresses social influence, an important aspect of TPB.
Assessing perceived behavioral control, aligns well with TPB.

original_with_comments.overall_comment: The survey effectively captures key components of the Theory of Planned Behavior; however, minor rephrasing for enhanced clarity could benefit the overall respondent experience.

revised_survey.theme: The Theory of Planned Behavior Survey
revised_survey.purpose: To assess consumer intentions and attitudes towards purchasing organic food

questions.question_text: I plan to purchase organic food within the next month.
I believe that purchasing organic food has health benefits.
I am confident in my ability to buy organic food when I choose to.
My close friends and family believe that I should purchase organic food.
I have complete control over my decision to purchase organic food.

question_1.reason: Clear and simple language increases comprehension and ensures that respondents do not face confusion about the satisfaction rating.

question_2.reason: A likelihood scale better captures respondents' intent in recommending the product, allowing for a more nuanced understanding of customer loyalty.

question_3.reason: This change allows respondents to identify multiple features that they value, ensuring more comprehensive feedback rather than forcing them to choose just one.

question_4.reason: Using straightforward language ensures that respondents understand what is being asked regarding their experience with the website.

question_5.change: Maintained as open-ended for qualitative insights.
question_5.reason: Retaining this format allows respondents to express detailed and specific suggestions, which can provide better directions for improvements.
